announcements.title: Slime Impact 2D!
body: New Features: Pyro Metre, Flame Ability, Heal Ability, Player Dashing, Stamina System, Custom Cursor, Full Controller Support, Dialogue Skipping, Respawn Invincibility, Visual Damage Feedback.

Changes & Fixes: Enemy balance updates, camera improvements, UI scaling fixes, hitbox corrections, ability behavior tweaks, softlock prevention, visual and audio fixes, menu fixes, and multiple gameplay bug fixes.

announcements.title: Cubo v0.2.6
body: Enemy balance improvements, Time Dialled reliability fixes, refined background colors, Spear Guard rebalance, bounce mushroom alignment fix, and main menu fade restored.

announcements.title: Momentum Bound
body: New bosses added, hitflash implemented, and variable door sprites introduced.

announcements.title: Everdew
body: Save & load system added, options now adjustable from the main menu, UI colors refined for readability, and tooltips temporarily removed due to a UI issue.

announcements.title: Launcher
body: Fuzzy search added (including developer name search), and notification delivery accuracy improved.
